attributes.title: This is for Rachel, you big fat, white nasty, smelling fat…

attributes.review: Once I downloaded this app, a scary high pitch sound gave out. The sound made my 97 year old grandmothers ears bleed. After she slipped on the blood and broke her elbow. We then smelled something burning. Yup, our house lit on fire. When I ran out I saw orange RATS that looked like the president. They held a ritual around my burning house chatting “Donald Trump is a racist”.  I am and will be forever in shock and pain. My grandmother lost her hearing along with her ears. Never again will we associate with this app.
attributes.title: Horrible. Almost DIED.

attributes.review: this app has made my phone glitch SO hard. too many roaches on this app it’s now DISGUSTING 💅🏽. While I was on this app looking for news about our ROACH president I stumbled upon a paragraph and while i was reading the paragraph a ROACH appeared on my screen. It was truly disgusting and then my phone glitches into an orbit. All the sudden it started to smell FISHY. But as i deleted this app all of the things were gone such as roaches, glitching, and fish smells. DONT NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP IT WILL RUIN YOUR PHONE!!!!
attributes.title: disappointed

attributes.review: So, decided to help out the peach. Because he’s struggling against biden, and is salty. attributes.title: Terrible! Took 4 hours to download

attributes.review: I downloaded the app to try to understand OUR president more but when i opened the app it was slow and glitchy. I’ve see other reviews talking about the same thing so just don’t download this app it’s a waste of space and isn’t very informative, a better app to learn more about our president is Tik Tok! It is very informative and a great app to use and interact with and it isn’t glitchy or slow!
attributes.title: Glitchy and slow🙄🤦🏽‍♀️
